editorialNotes.short: Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend

editorialNotes.short: Try a wild new look – risk-free!
editorialNotes.tagline: Go all out for crazy hair day!

editorialNotes.standard: Nothing beats a kid-friendly game that keeps the whole family captivated—and Toca has us snipping, straightening, and styling to our heart's content. Once we've perfected our customer's silly new ‘dos, we make sure to add some accessories, snap a pic, and share the hair.

ios.subtitle: Make a routine & put on a show

editorialNotes.standard: Bursting with beats and energy, Toca Dance will make the whole family want to get up and groove. This incredibly cute game puts kids in charge of their own musical production—choosing dancers, costumes and techno tracks, and choreographing moves using simple swipes and taps. Once the performance starts, the real fun begins: you can fling items at the stage, set off pyrotechnics and other cool effects and even cheer (or boo) your squad. Seeing the payoff—an awesome video you can share—will encourage players to jump right back in and start working on their next great show.

ios.subtitle: Put out fires! Save the day!

editorialNotes.short: Explore the exciting life of a junior firefighter with Dr. Panda.

ios.subtitle: Build up a farm & grow veggies

editorialNotes.standard: Even a kid can run Dr. Panda’s farm, and ours love being in charge. Who wouldn’t? Milking cows, gathering honey, making jam—it’s easy to figure out and fun selling food to unlock new activities. Plus, the papercraft-style animals couldn’t be more adorable.
editorialNotes.short: Grow wheat, collect milk, and make bread on your own farm.

editorialNotes.standard: The line never ends at Dr. Panda’s Ice Cream Truck, and that’s just how our kids like it. They jump at the chance to whip up new flavours and serve sky-high sundaes piled with toppings. Watching customers gobble down their desserts cracks them up every time (and us too).

editorialNotes.short: Blast off into outer space and learn more about the universe.

name: 123 Genius PRO - First Numbers and Counting Games for Kids

editorialNotes.short: Compose fun musical beats with amusing animals.
Blast off to outer space and travel to new planets.

editorialNotes.standard: An utterly charming way to introduce young kids to music and animation, Loopimal is simple and powerful in a way that almost defies description. Kids arrange and rearrange tiles in sequences underneath a cute polar bear, octopus, and the like, triggering a series of musical tones mirrored by adorable dances from the animal gang. There are no goals and no consequences—just a safe place to learn, play, and laugh.

name: Montessori French Syllables - learn to read French words in a fun lab setting

editorialNotes.short: Help Mammoth solve puzzles and learn about fractions.

ios.subtitle: Create to show what you know!

editorialNotes.standard: See the beauty and power of ABCs in an app where every letter holds secret words. Touch an F, and it sprouts a foot, then feathers, then a fan; a G becomes a guitar in a garden with ghosts. Kids will love poking and prodding their way to the end of the alphabet, while parents will dig the unpredictability and gorgeous animation in this Apple Design Award winner.
editorialNotes.short: Interactive alphabet learning where words and letters come to life.
